myRoadmaps.title: Your learning roadmaps
myRoadmaps.subtitle: View and manage your personalized learning paths

empty.title: No roadmaps yet
empty.description: Start your learning journey by creating your first personalized roadmap. Build structured paths to achieve your goals.

createModal.title: New Roadmap
createModal.question: How would you like to create your roadmap?

chatbot.title: Guided by Aithena
chatbot.description: Let our AI tutor guide you through a personalized roadmap creation conversation.

manual.title: Start from scratch
manual.description: Build your roadmap manually using our visual editor.

detail.copyRoadmapTooltip: Creates a copy of the roadmap in your account

topbar.noDescription: No description has been added yet.

deleteModal.title: Delete roadmap?
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

form.instruction: Add a title and description to your roadmap.

sharing.title: Access options
sharing.instruction: Pick and modify who can access this roadmap.
sharing.onlyYouAccess: Only you will be able to access.
sharing.anyoneWithLink: Anyone with the link can access.

explore.title: Explore public roadmaps
explore.subtitle: Discover learning paths created by the community

empty.title: No public roadmaps found
empty.description: Try adjusting your search terms or filters to find more roadmaps.

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load roadmaps. Please try again.
errors.rangeError: Max value cannot be less than min value

taskInformation.visitResources: Visit the following resources to learn more:

chatbot.initialMessage: I can help you create a learning roadmap for various subjects like programming languages, web development, data science, and more. Send me a message to get started!

conversationEnded.message: The conversation has ended. Start a new conversation to continue.

validation.noObjectives: A public roadmap must contain at least one objective.
validation.unassignedTasksVisibility: All tasks of a public roadmap must be connected to an objective before making it public.
validation.unassignedTasksSave: All tasks of a public roadmap must be connected to an objective before saving.
